attributes.action: Have this new bank holiday on 5th of November rather than the 11th.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You know people are asking for a Bank Holiday in November to remember fallen comrades?  Well, I understand the importance of Remembrance Sunday, and can understand the logic of stopping what you're doing and having a think for 2 minutes, but it's not really something you would celebrate, and having a day off work seems a bit OTT.  BUT WE ALL LOVE FIREWORKS AND BURNING TERRORISTS!  So if we are going to have a Bank Holiday in November then we should have the 5th rather than the 11th.  REMEMBER, REMEMBER...
